Classes/Persister.html.name: Persister
Classes/Persister.html.abstract: An object that can store and retrieve values from a Storage instance, optionally passing values through a

Classes/InMemoryStorage.html.name: InMemoryStorage
Classes/InMemoryStorage.html.abstract: Storage that stores values in memory; values will not be persisted between app launches or instances of InMemoryStorage.

Classes/Subscription.html.name: Subscription
Classes/Subscription.html.abstract: An object that represents a subscription to a Storage update.
